SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.view

Class Flow

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.view.Flow
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListener, ClientActions, Runnable, Remote
public class Flow extends Object implements Runnable, ClientActions, GameListener
The Flow class implements the game flow logic, handling client actions and game events. It runs as a separate thread and interacts with the user through the UI.

      public boolean isCreate()

      Returns:
      true if the user intends to create a new game, false otherwise.

    • beginDraw

      public void beginDraw(GameView gameView)
      Begins the draw phase of the game. This method sets the game status to running, updates the game view, and triggers the BEGIN_DRAW event.
      Specified by:
      beginDraw in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      gameView - The current game view to be updated.

    • wrongCardPlay

      public void wrongCardPlay(GameView gameView)
      Handles an incorrect card play. This method updates the game view, displays a message indicating the wrong card play, and triggers the BEGIN_PLAY event.
      Specified by:
      wrongCardPlay in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      gameView - The current game view to be updated.

    • sentMessage

      public void sentMessage(String sender, String receiver, String message, String time)
      Handles sending a message. This method displays the "sent" or "received" message based on the sender and receiver, and triggers the SENT_MESSAGE event.
      Specified by:
      sentMessage in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      sender - The sender of the message.
      receiver - The receiver of the message.
      message - The content of the message.
      time - The time the message was sent.

    • gameEnded

      public void gameEnded(String winner, HashMap<String,Integer> rank)
      Handles the end of the game. This method updates the game status to ended, displays the winner and rankings, and triggers the GAME_ENDED event.
      Specified by:
      gameEnded in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      winner - The nickname of the player who won the game.
      rank - The final rankings of the players.

    • noConnectionError

      public void noConnectionError()
      Handles a no connection error. This method displays a message indicating that there is no connection.
